text: Khiladi may refer to: * Khiladi (franchise), which includes: ** Khiladi (1992 film), an Indian action film ** Main Khiladi Tu Anari, 1994 ** Sabse Bada Khiladi, 1995 ** Khiladiyon Ka Khiladi, 1996 ** Mr. and Mrs. Khiladi, 1997 ** International Khiladi, 1999 ** Khiladi 420, 2000 ** Khiladi 786, 2012 * Khiladi (1968 film), a Hindi action film * Kiladi, a 2000 Kannada film * Khiladi (2013 film), a Bengali slapstick comedy film * Khiladi (2016 film), a 2016 Bhojpuri-language film
title: Khiladi
